title: Kyou mo Kyou to te Tape wa Mawaru

alternative_titles.ja: 今日も今日とてテープは回る

synopsis:
A story of sisters who make a living by a slightly different recording work. 
A sister in charge of recording and a sister in charge of editing. 
Born on exactly the same day, with the same father, but different mothers.

But today the tape turns like this without hesitation.
